name: Time Runner
overview: Released by Funsoft as Time Runner in North America and by WizardSoft as Blade Runner in Italy, this Amidar style action game was created by Scott Maxwell & Troy Lyndon. Time Runner is a game in which you move your character along a pellet grid, which changes from level to level, while you collect points and avoid enemy characters. The goal is to, similar to PacMan, cover the entire board and fill-in each rectangular area, which will then become colored in. Time Runner was first developed on the Atari 800 and later converted to the Commodore-64.
